channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: International ChildrenS Rosary
channel.desc: The Childrens Rosary prayer group movement lead the Joyful Mysteries of the Rosary and communicate their love for Jesus and the Blessed Mother.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Savouring Our Faith
channel.desc: Santiago de Compostela is the culmination of life-changing journeys for so many on the Way of St. James. Fr. Leo shows how to feed the soul that seeks the Kingdom of Heaven.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Hidden Gems - Catholic Shrines In America
channel.desc: The Queen of Peace Shrine in Sioux City, Iowa, with its towering statues of Jesus and Mary, stunning Last Supper carving, and garden paths.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Daily mass
channel.desc: The Holy Sacrifice of the Mass with the friars each day from the EWTN Chapel in Irondale, Alabama. LIVE Monday through Saturday at 8 am Eastern.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Holy rosary from lourdes
channel.desc: Pilgrims from around the world gather and pray the Rosary from the Lourdes Grotto in France, site of the famous apparitions by the Blessed Virgin Mary in 1858.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Praying As A Family
channel.desc: These families demonstrate the powerful and gentle love that binds husband and wife together with their children.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live
channel.desc: Mother discusses how Gods transforming presence makes us more like Christ.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Real Life Catholic
channel.desc: A chance to experience the stories of immigrants who found freedom in the city where the Declaration of Independence was signed.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Trust In God
channel.desc: We live in a fallen world, filled with suffering. But despite the trials, God is always in control. God is Almighty and sovereign. God is at work in our lives.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Life on the rock
channel.desc: Fr. Mark and the Franciscan Friars of the Eternal Word are back. Interviews, spiritual insights from the friars, music videos and much more.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: The Faithful Traveler In Portugal
channel.desc: Journey to the shrine at Fatima, built after the Marian apparitions of 1917, and discover the complexities and beauty found at the Sanctuary of Our Lady of the.[(96057)]
